body: Like the other cultured degenerates, I also came from Rebuild World. It's a pretty good manga, though the upload frequency is abysmal
Came here for a good sauce hidden in Rebuild world but i found no english translation... sad
I was currently reading a manga call "Rebuild World" and in the chapter 4 there was a long text and it also mentioned"213873" so I tried to search it here and find out that it was a secret code
cure march is so cute, she's wearing high heels too
